resources.string: A webtoon adaptation of Solo Leveling was first serialized in KakaoPage on March 4, 2018; it was illustrated by Jang Sung-rak (Dubu)
Tower of God[a] is a South Korean manhwa released as a webtoon written and illustrated by S.I.U.
Hardcore Leveling Warrior is a Manga/Manhwa/Manhua in english language, Action series, english chapters have been translated and you can read them here.

Rai awakens from an 820-year sleep and begins his new life as a student at an institute founded by his loyal servant, Frankenstein. But his peaceful days are interrupted by attackers known as the Unions.
